column1: Alice's gross income for the year 2014 is $97407. In 2014, Alice's father Bob lived at the house that Alice maintains and resides in. Alice takes the standard deduction in 2014.
column2: How much tax does Alice have to pay in 2014?

column1: Bob is Alice's father. Alice has paid $45252 to Bob for work done in the year 2017.
column2: How much tax does Alice have to pay in 2017?

column1: Alice has paid $4512 to Bob for work done from Feb 1st, 2005 to Sep 2nd, 2005. In 2005, Alice was paid $133200. Alice is allowed itemized deductions of $2939 and $8744.
column2: How much tax does Alice have to pay in 2005?
